name: Force YouTube Caption Color
description:
YouTube's captions ignore your set color if it's unsure about the word it detected, forcing grey colors that may not fit your color scheme. This fixes that.
Notice: This only affects the HTML5 video player.

user.name: Xane Myers (Xane_MM)
user.about: I'm the developer of Magical Mary 1! I've also created userstyles in the past but I haven't updated them in forever. (They might not work as a result.)

obsoletion_message: Repurposed "YouTube Red" logo style into a fix for YouTube.
additional_info: Fixed problem where your selected color affected unrelated text on the page! Yes, this style only affects the captions now!
